shortDescription: "To test whether an expression is True or False, one must compare it to True or to False"

To determine whether an expression evaluates to `True` or `False`, one must use a relational operator (`==` or `!=`) to compare with a `bool` literal (`True` or `False`)

frontmatter.shortDescription: To test whether an expression is True or False, one must compare it to True or to False
frontmatter.shortCorrection: To test whether an expression is True or False, one can just use it
